mapper.select: SELECT categrpno, name, seqno, visible, rdate, cnt FROM notice_categrp ORDER BY categrpno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_categrp(categrpno, name, seqno, visible, rdate, cnt) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(categrpno), 0) + 1 as categrpno FROM notice_categrp), #{name}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate, 0)
